description: Trust fund brat, Penny Pax is a control freak. Day after day she tortures her maids by making them arrange her jewelry by her exact specifications. Felony is a new hire with a bad attitude and klepto tendencies who thinks Ms. Penny is just a rich bitch on a power trip. When Penny discovers Felony's sticky fingers, she threatens to blackmail Penny by telling her father about the bag of 'candy' she found while cleaning. Felony throws Penny to the bed and Chanel joins in to give Penny the ultimate lesbian revenge fuck. They begin with OTK Spanking and Dildo Gag Action. They put an ashtray plug in her butt, tie her to the billiard table, and then DP and make a mess of her antique upholstered chair!
title: Trust Fund Brat BOUND, DP'd and FACE FUCKED by Hot Maids
